verbose_text: First, acetylation was performed in acetic anhydride at 100 degreesC in the presence of sodium acetate to form preferentially the beta anomer of lactose heptaacetate (alpha/beta = 1:5).
evidence: acetylation was performed in acetic anhydride at 100 degreesC in the presence of sodium acetate to form preferentially the beta anomer of lactose
